question: Which Union Ministry has launched the revised version of Swachhata App to handle queries specific to COVID 19?
option2: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
option4: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs (MoHUA) has launched revised version of Swachhata App to handle queries specific to COVID 19.
The Swachhata-MoHUA Application is a flagship grievance redressal tool of MoHUA, under the Swachh Bharat Mission (Urban). Now using this app, the COVID19-related complaints of the citizens will be redressed by the Urban Local bodies.
